PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-03862024-04-19FIN
ActCanadian International Trade Tribunal Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL PROCUREMENT INQUIRY REGULATIONS in order to (1) replace a reference to the old treaty with the new one and update chapter numbers; and (2) remove from the regulations a reference to the old CUFTA Chapter on Government Procurements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0069 Publication Date: 2024-05-08
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL PROCUREMENT INQUIRY REGULATIONS in order to (1) replace a reference to the old treaty with the new one and update chapter numbers; and (2) remove from the regulations a reference to the old CUFTA Chapter on Government Procurements.
